content: *a free pattern from the book the story of homespun lion brand yarn * lion brand pattern # colorfulwheels skill level beginner + level 2 homespun® article #790 - 7 colors 8 balls total crochet hook - size k-10 5 6 5 mm gauge 1 pattern repeat = 3 7 5 cm and 7 row = 4 10 cm in pattern special stitch shell work in pattern following color sequence for 85 row finish with crochet edging
